title: Help us to investigate implicit bias
p1: Please help us learn more about the demographic characteristics of authors submitting to eLife by providing anonymous information about yourself. Skipping this will not affect your submission.
p2: Your answers will not be disclosed to the editors or reviewers of your submission, but aggregate data will inform the research we undertake into the submission and review process.
p3: Learn more about why we ask for this data.

independentResearcher.label: Are you an "independent researcher"?
independentResearcher.helperText: We define this as scientists who have secured funding to support a research group, for example in a Group Leader, Prinicpal Inviestigator or Assistant Professor position.

independentResearcherYear.label: In approximately which year did you become an independent researcher?

countryIndentifyAs.helperText: Minority groups can vary across the globe. Please answer based on whether you identify as a member of a minority group in your country of residence/affiliation. Read more about why we ask about ethnicity.
